channel.title: Object Placement (pimpscape)
channel.description:
I added these objects to the object.cfg im pimpscape. They didn't appear in the game. Can anyone help?
[code]object = 1719 3196 3434 0 -3 1 true tree object = 1734 3196 3418 0 -3 1 true magic tree object = 1734 3200 2420 0 -3 1 true magic tree object = 1740 3196 3423 0 -3 1 true Yew tree object = 1740 3196 3426 0 -3 1 true Yew tree object = 1736 3193 3432 0 -3 1 true Willow tree object = 1736 3194 3437 0 -3 1 true Willow tree object = 1739 3197 3440 0 -3 1 true Oak tree object = 1739 3199 3436 0 -3 1 true Oak tree[/code]

item.title: Object Placement (pimpscape)
item.dc:creator: @hippie hippie
item.description:
@hippie wrote:

ok. here, in client.java, serch public void addglobalobj

under the void, add this.

public void newObjects(){}
now, find case 121:

add newObjects(); into it.

ok, now, nack to that {},

use this format to add objects:
AddGlobalObj( X COOARD, Y COOARD, OBJECT ID, FACE ID, 10);

Read full topic

item.title: Object Placement (pimpscape)
item.dc:creator: @croranger croranger
item.description:
@croranger wrote:

mrtube:

compile your server

no thats is not problem, problem is that you dont add the objects in object.cfg you add them into client.java
